gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 121, Wizards 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Wizards, 121-114. Tyler Herro led the way for the Heat with 24 points (4-7 3PM), 10 rebounds and nine assists, while Jimmy Butler added 20 points, seven rebounds and three steals in the victory. Kyle Kuzma tallied 22 points (4-9 3PM) for the Wizards in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 1-0 in East Group B play; 2-4 in the regular season, while the Wizards fall to 0-1 in East Group B play; 1-4 in the regular season.
